common.leave_tab_confirmation: You have unsaved changes, continue anyway?

index.entry_in_replacement_message: Media is still being saved. Please wait or try again later.

convert.wait: Please wait while media is processing

error.resolution_not_supported: The editor is not supported on this screen size
error.orientation_not_supported: To view the Editor, please adjust your device to Landscape
error.conv_fail: Entry conversion failed, cannot create quiz.

welcome.intro:
Press Start to create a new quiz.
A copy of the media will be created and the original media will stay intact.

general.name: Quiz Name
general.welcome_txt: In this video, you will be given a Quiz. Good Luck!
general.invideo_hb: The following text will be displayed:
general.invideo_txt: "All questions must be answered. The quiz will be submitted at the end."

exp.questions_list_hb: Your viewers will be able to download the quiz question list before they start playing the media
exp.edit_answer_hb: Your viewers will be able to change an answer before submitting the entire quiz
exp.skip_hb: Your viewers will be able to skip a question and come back to answer it later

score.title: Upon Submission:
score.no_score_hb: A 'Thank You' message will display after submitting the quiz.
score.yes_score_hb: Your viewers will see the quiz score page after the quiz is submitted.
score.feedback_hb: Your viewers will be able to see correct/incorrect answers

ques.title: How to Create a Question
ques.txt:
While watching the video, press pause where you want a question.
Press the '+' button to add a question and related answers
Donâ€™t forget to shuffle the answers!
You can add and edit as much as you like

question.unsaved_warn: Are you sure you want to proceed? Any unsaved changes will be lost
question.empty_ans: There is an empty answer box, please fill it in
question.delete_warn: Are you sure you want to delete this question?

player.label: Player
player.jump_to_start: Jump to start of selected range
player.jump_to_end: Jump to end of selected range

timeline.label: Timeline
timeline.left_handlebar: Select left handlebar on movie bar
timeline.right_handlebar: Select right handlebar on movie bar

home.title_subtext: To create engaging content such as interactive quizzes, clips and trimmed videos easily.

editor.title: Video Editor

save_as_dialog.header: Create a Copy of the Media

save_dialog.override_message: You are about to override {{entryName}} permanently. Your changes will affect captions and cue points as well. This process may take a while.
save_dialog.save_warn: Are you sure you want to continue?
save_dialog.save_in_progress: Saving is in progress... Please be patient.
save_dialog.save_complete_no_auto_approved: Note that your media must be approved by the application administrator. Until the version is approved, the original version will be displayed.

editor.conversion_error_message: An error occurred while trying to convert the media. Please try again later.
editor.trimming_failed_error_message: An error occurred while tyring to save the media. Please try again later.

timeline.frames_error_message: * Frames preview are not supported for this type of media
